text: “Kodi sudaone kuti Allah amatsitsa madzi kuchokera ku mitambo? Choncho kupyolera m’madziwo tatulutsa zipatso zautoto wosiyanasiyana (zakuda, zofiira, zachikasu, zobiriwira, pomwe madzi ake ndiamodzi omwewo). Ndipo m’mapiri muli timizere; toyera ndi tofiira tosiyana utoto wake, ndi (tina) takuda kwambiri
